name: Opulence
text:
Give me your tongue,/ Scrolling from your mouth./ Give me your words.

/ Iâ€™m not here to scoop them up,/ Splattered.

/ I will not prod/ With forceps poking tonsils,/ Plucking into your throat.

/ Liquor lacquered eyes look through me./ Pitter patter steps pass me.

/ I will be invisible/ Where you need me to hide./ I will listen.

/ I long/ To hear you slang./
